channel.title: Blogs on Neil D. Ryan
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Neil D. Ryan

item.title: Neil-isms
item.description: Neil-isms I’m not a parent and I’m not sure if I want kids, but I have this awesome image of myself as a “your gender-neutral aunt linda” (the comma can go anywhere and it’s accurate), and I’d like to have some sayings that I get to say all the ti me. I don’t want to fuck it up, so I’m preparing and curating a list. Your gender-netural aunt linda exits the room with; twitter bot incoming.
